Key Match Events: Jackson Jobe made his MLB debut in the 7-1 win over the Tampa Bay Rays, throwing a scoreless ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Jackson Jobe was called up for his MLB debut, joining the postseason push
Post-Match Reflections: Jobe felt happy and comfortable during his debut, and he's excited to continue pitching for the Tigers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The fans chanted Jobe's name during the game, and he threw seven of nine pitches for strikes with an average fastball speed of 98 mph
Others: Jobe is expected to pitch out of the bullpen for the rest of 2024, including the postseason, and he should be in the Opening Day starting rotation in 2025
